The armor becomes heavier, causing exhaustion to occasionally slow you down
enchantment.cursery.curse_blindness.info: You have a chance to be blinded upon getting hit
enchantment.cursery.curse_weakness.info: You have a chance to be weakened upon getting hit
enchantment.cursery.curse_explosive.info: You have a chance to trigger an explosion on usage
enchantment.cursery.curse_hurtful.info: You take extra damage on getting hit
enchantment.cursery.curse_hungryhealth.i: Getting hit consumes hunger for health
enchantment.cursery.curse_stubby.info: Chance to only fire a weak arrow
enchantment.cursery.curse_recoil.info: Chance to get knocked back on firing
enchantment.cursery.curse_loose.info: Chance to throw the item on usage
enchantment.cursery.curse_anvil.info: Chance to get hit by anvils
enchantment.cursery.curse_hungry.info: Chance to get Hunger on hit
enchantment.cursery.curse_undead.info: Chance to get lit on fire under the sun
enchantment.cursery.curse_poison.info: Chance to get poisoned when hit
enchantment.cursery.curse_switchy.info: Chance to switch hands on hit
enchantment.cursery.curse_electrified.in: Chance to zap you on usage
enchanted_book.desc: §5You feel a slight presence of dark curse magic
enchanted_table.desc: §5Curse magic seems to have tainted the table
enchant_curse_applied_1.desc: §5You feel a cold chill on your soul
enchant_curse_applied_2.desc: §5An unearthly presence sends a shiver down your spine
